summary: This is an email from a DOJ system notifying recipients of an attached voice message related to the Epstein case, sent on August 8, 2019, the day after Jeffrey Epstein's death. It appears to be official communication regarding victim notifications.

events.title: DOJ Voice Message Notification
events.description: An email is sent from a DOJ system notifying recipients of an attached voice message related to the Epstein case.

keyFacts: The document is an email notification from a DOJ system (postmaster@voip.usa.doj.gov) regarding an attached voice message.
The email was sent on August 8, 2019, which was the day after Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody.
The email was addressed to 'USANYS-EpsteinVictims', indicating it was part of official victim notification procedures.
The subject line indicates the attachment is a voice message, suggesting audio communication from authorities.
The timing suggests this communication was likely related to notifying victims about developments in the case following Epstein's death.
